item.title: ğŸŸ¡ 11:44 p.m. The alarm was sounded in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still ongoing in:- m. Marganets and Marganets territorial community - Myriv territorial community - m. Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community - Chervonogrigorivska Territorial Community
